definition: to bludgeon to death/(fig.) to defeat sb by publicly criticizing them
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to praise sb in a way that puts them at a disadvantage
to deal a single fatal blow/(fig.) to totally repudiate sb because of a minor error
lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others
the masses rise to attack it (idiom); Everyone is against the idea./universally abhorrent
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
in order to warn against following bad examples (idiom)/as a warning to others
not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong
pinyin: bu4 wen4 qing1 hong2 zao4 bai2

definition: to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
to bludgeon/to hit with a big stick
